post:
Dear members,

For a limited time, we have a Special page from where you can order discounted VPS servers, starting from just €1.50 per month!

Page URL: https://www.hetnix.com/specialvps

Be sure to spread the word with your friends because this being a special offer, it won't last long, so help others to grab a Special VPS Server as well.
Should you share this info on social media, please include #hetnix #specialvps hashtags in your posts.

If you haven't followed us, below you can find our Facebook and Instagram page:

https://www.facebook.com/hetnix.srl
https://www.instagram.com/hetnix.srl

We can't wait for you to become our valued customer!

Thank you,
HETNiX.
